content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace entity at position (0.0, 0.0) with a furnace source and result.

### Burner Mining Drill at unknown position
Consists of a burner mining drill entity, but its position is not yet specified in the logs.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when harvesting without being close to the resource
- Make sure to move to the target resource entity where you want to harvest from before harvesting items.
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance is 10 units.
### Errors when extracting without having ingredients
- Ensure that the entity has the required ingredients before attempting to extract items.
